name: Diamond Craze
description:
Join countless others and play the newest match-3 craze for FREE!
Get ready for an epic puzzle matching adventure. Slide and match tons of sparkling gems. Use crazy tools to whack crates, crack rocks and smash ice-cubes!

"Just Great!! Awesome and Simple...what else do u need...play it anywhere anytime...at home at school or even in the bathroom...but u will never get bored of it!!" - 5 Stars

WHY YOU'LL LOVE DIAMOND CRAZE:
• FREE to play
• SWAP sparkling jewels in 180 epic levels for the adventure of a lifetime
• STRATEGIZE your game with Bombs and Dynamite!
• USE HAMMERS AND PICKS to eliminate hordes of crates, rocks and ice-cubes!
• EARN COINS and upgrade your tools for even more mayhem!
• BEAT THE BOSS every ten levels!
• ENJOY a toony design with hilarious music
• EASY and FUN to play, impossible to master!
• ONLINE or OFFLINE, play to your heart's content

LET'S BE FACEBOOK FRIENDS:
▸ www.facebook.com/DiamondCraze

Diamond Craze is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra lives will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device's settings.

If you like Diamond Craze, please take a moment to give us a review or rating. It will encourage us to keep expanding and improving the game!
